messages.message: Anyone else noticing file loads hanging in prod? I have a public file that I use in interviews, and it was hanging yesterday and this morning occasionally. Even just opening this public file in a web browser (and hard-refreshing) hangs indefinitely a little more than 1/3 of the time. https://instabase.com/erickfriis/recruiting-public/fs/Instabase%20Drive/interviewing/ocr-parse/ocr-interview-new.json?content-disposition=raw
I’m fairly certain it’s not my internet because I can run a speedtest in a parallel window and it connects fine even while an instabase.com (http://instabase.com) request is hanging
If I wait for some response to come back, I get the “Gateway Timeout” error, so must be something going on past nginx
It's not just your internet, candidates I've interviewed have also mentioned the file doesn't load for them or hangs

one of the webapp pods must have gotten deadlocked and every request that goes there gets timed out. redeployment with fileservice v2 disabled in the web services will fix. redeployment coming soon. fyi @Xi Cheng
Hi all, I do see the problematic webapp pod, and have quarantined it
